class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        p = [a+b for a,b in points]
        m = [a-b for a,b in points]
        print(p,m)
        p1, p2 = max(p), min(p)
        m1, m2 = max(m), min(m)
        p1p = p.index(p1)
        p2p = p.index(p2)
        m1p = m.index(m1)
        m2p = m.index(m2)
        
        def helpp(idx):
            pp = p[:idx]+p[idx+1:]
            mp = m[:idx]+m[idx+1:]
            return max(max(pp)-min(pp), max(mp)-min(mp))
        
        ans = 10000000000000000000000000
        for i in [p1p,p2p,m1p,m2p]:
            ans = min(ans, helpp(i))
        return ans
